::: {.experiments-intro}
These online experiments are part of ongoing research on face perception. Each experiment is password protected. If you want to participate in this demo version, please send me an e-mail.
:::

::: {.experiments-grid}

::: {.experiment-card}
### Face Perception Study

Measures how accurately people identify race and facial expressions when viewing individual faces at different sizes.

**Duration:** ~10 minutes

[Start Experiment](experiments/exp_1_attention_accuracy/){.experiment-link}
:::

::: {.experiment-card}
### Face Memory Study

Tests how well people remember the racial composition and expressions of faces shown in groups.

**Duration:** ~15 minutes

[Start Experiment](experiments/exp_2_memory/){.experiment-link}
:::

::: {.experiment-card}
### Subjective Traits Study

Measures how people rate traits like trustworthiness, competence, attractiveness, and friendliness based on profile pictures at different sizes.

**Duration:** ~15 minutes

[Start Experiment](experiments/exp_3_subjective_traits/){.experiment-link}
:::

:::
